name: playwright-test-setup
description: A Playwright test setup with Allure reporting

scripts.test:development: cross-env ENV=development npx playwright test && npx allure generate ./allure-results --clean -o ./allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.test:production: cross-env ENV=production npx playwright test && npx allure generate ./allure-results --clean -o ./allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
